name: Niles
tagline: Control your devices with your voice
body:
### Welcome to Niles
Have you ever remembered that you left your computer on as you were just about to walk outside? Well not anymore, Niles is ready to control your devices on your command. You'll never need to get out of bed after watching a movie, ever! Simply say **Alexa, tell Niles to turn off my desktop** and Niles will do it for you.

### What can Niles do?
Currently Niles can turn off, sleep, lock, and restart Mac and Windows computers. I am working to include functionality and am happily taking suggestions, just create a new [Github issue](https://github.com/Simple-Complexity/Niles/issues/new)

### Get Niles now
Download the Niles client for Mac or Windows, log in with your amazon account, and get the Alexa skill. It's that easy.
* [Mac download](https://github.com/Simple-Complexity/Niles/releases/download/v0.0.1/Niles-0.0.1.dmg)
* [Windows download](https://github.com/Simple-Complexity/Niles/releases/download/v0.0.1/Niles.Setup.0.0.1-ia32.exe)

### Support or Contact
